experiences: Collaborated with a team of 5+ developers to build Mason, a multiplayer board game connecting players via a host mobile server on the same network.
Developed the UI for a job portal similar to Glassdoor, improving user experience and responsiveness.
Integrated APIs and followed Agile methodologies, reducing the development cycle by 2 weeks.
Built a food delivery app from scratch for street vendors using Flutter for frontend and Flask for backend.
Designed and tested 10+ REST APIs for PostgreSQL integration to ensure seamless data flow.
Deployed backend server on AWS S3 and published the app on Google Play Store.
Developed a mobile app for the Plasma 2024 conference, used by 200+ attendees.
Implemented real-time schedule updates, speaker details, and interactive Q&A features.
